article_title: This simple, 7-minute cartoon video makes health care reform -- or Obamacare -- easy to understand: The Frugal Patient (Video)
article_text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- Still don’t understand health care reform? Wondering what you need to do, if anything, before most of it takes effect this January?

This simple cartoon video explains the whole, complicated thing — in 7 minutes.

It was created by the nonprofit Kaiser Family Foundation, whose website can tell you just about everything you ever wanted to know about Obamacare.







On Twitter: @dianesuchetka

Have a health care savings tip or question? Email me at thefrugalpatient@plaind.com.
